conversion_verification.notes: The 2D floor plan has been converted into a high-fidelity 3D isometric cutaway model.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent height/thickness; viewing angle is perfect isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to original wall segments and room proportions; bathroom layouts match exactly.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D plan precisely, including the round dining table and rug details.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting. Background is clean.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves all geometric details, furniture arrangements, and spatial relationships from the 2D source.
